item.title: Rewriting FORTRAN Software In Rust
item.description: github.com/rse-standrewscs/shallow-water TL;DR: Rewriting isn’t always bad but it probably was here, Amdahl’s Law is important and memory bandwidth is a potential bottleneck when doing many simple double precision math operations Introduction As part of an Undergraduate Research Assistant Scheme in my first year of university I was tasked with parallelising a piece of shallow water simulation software written in FORTRAN by Dr David Dritschel of the Vortex Dynamics Research Group, under supervision of Dr.

item.title: My First Quadcopter
item.description: Recently, I found an old YouTube account of mine and along with it, this video. I made it aged 13 using my first quadcopter, a HobbyKing KK2.0 “mini quad”. I believe a member of the model club I attended had given me their old 72MHz radio and receiver which I used to fly this drone in the video. Please excuse the cheesy music.
